p: Results were expressed in mean ± standard error of the mean (SEM) and comparisons were made between negative control, positive control and treatment groups of various doses using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by posthoc Tukey’s test using statistical package for the social sciences (SPSS) version 20.0. All data were analyzed at 95% confidence interval and P-values less than 0.05 was considered as statistically significant. Coefficient of determination (linear regression analysis) (R 2), was also determined by using Microsoft excel 2013. The analyzed data were presented using tables and figures.
